name: piwigo
description: Piwigo is a self-hosted photo gallery and management platform. It includes tagging, albums, metadata, and plugins for organizing and sharing large image collections.
features: Album organization: Create hierarchical album structures to organize photos by events, dates, or themes.
Batch uploads: Upload multiple photos simultaneously with drag-and-drop or FTP for large collections.
Tag management: Apply tags to photos for flexible categorization and cross-album organization.
EXIF metadata: Automatically extract and display camera settings, dates, and location data from photos.
User permissions: Control access with user groups, album-level permissions, and privacy settings.
Plugin system: Extend functionality with hundreds of community plugins for features and integrations.
Theme customization: Choose from multiple themes or create custom designs to match your brand.
Search functionality: Find photos by tags, albums, dates, ratings, or EXIF data with advanced filters.
Slideshow mode: Present photos in fullscreen slideshows with configurable transitions and timing.
Mobile apps: Access and upload photos from iOS and Android devices with native mobile applications.
Watermarking: Automatically apply watermarks to photos for copyright protection and branding.
Statistics and analytics: Track photo views, popular albums, and visitor activity with built-in analytics.
